{"id":164124377,"question_id":2,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 years, 9 months","timestamp":1531762710,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/164124377/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Two Numbers","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\r\n * Definition for singly-linked list.\r\n * struct ListNode {\r\n *     int val;\r\n *     ListNode *next;\r\n *     ListNode(int x) : val(x), next(NULL) {}\r\n * };\r\n */\r\nclass Solution {\r\npublic:\r\n    ListNode* addTwoNumbers(ListNode* l1, ListNode* l2) {\r\n        if(!l1) return l2;\r\n        if(!l2) return l1;\r\n        ListNode* dummy=new ListNode(0), *cur=dummy;\r\n        int carry=0;\r\n        while(l1 || l2){\r\n            int v1=(l1==NULL)? 0:l1->val;\r\n            int v2=(l2==NULL)? 0:l2->val;\r\n            int tmp=v1+v2+carry;\r\n            ListNode* node= new ListNode(tmp%10);\r\n            carry=tmp/10;\r\n            cur->next=node;\r\n            cur=cur->next;\r\n            if(l1) l1=l1->next;\r\n            if(l2) l2=l2->next;\r\n        }\r\n        if(carry>0){\r\n            ListNode* newnode= new ListNode(carry);\r\n            cur->next=newnode;\r\n        }\r\n        return dummy->next;\r\n    }\r\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-two-numbers","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
